      • heatColor

        public static java.awt.Color heatColor(float heat)
        Computes a 'heat color' (i.e. dark grey for 'cold' and dens red for 'hot'. The given heat is a value 0.0 (cold)...1.0 (hot).
        Parameters:
        heat - a heat value
        Returns:
        the heat color

      • circleCenterFromThreePoints

        public static double[] circleCenterFromThreePoints(double x1,
                                                   double y1,
                                                   double x2,
                                                   double y2,
                                                   double x3,
                                                   double y3)
        Computes a circle center by three points that reside on this circle. For any three points that are not on a straight line, there is only one such circle. A RuntimeExeption is issued, if the three points reside on a line.
        Parameters:
        x1 - point 1 x
        y1 - point 1 y
        x2 - point 2 x
        y2 - point 2 y
        x3 - point 3 x
        y3 - point 3 y
        Returns:
        double[2] with [0]: x, [1]: y

      • intersectTwoCircles

        public static double[][] intersectTwoCircles(double x1,
                                             double y1,
                                             double r1,
                                             double x2,
                                             double y2,
                                             double r2)
        Intersects two circles. We have three cases:
        • They intersect in two points. Then, both points are returned. The first point is the intersection that appears on the right side of the line between first and second circle center. The second is the one on the left.
        • They intersect in onw point. Then, two times the same point is returned.
        • They do not intersect. Then, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        x1 - first circle's center x
        y1 - first circle's center y
        r1 - first circle's radius
        x2 - second circle's center x
        y2 - second circle's center y
        r2 - second circle's radius
        Returns:
        an array of two, each x, y; or null if the circles do not intersect

      • paintJTSPolygonGeometry

        public static void paintJTSPolygonGeometry(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                                           Geometry geom,
                                           java.awt.Color fillColor,
                                           java.awt.Color borderColor,
                                           GeomJTS2PixelProjection projection)
        Paint a JTS Polygon Geometry (Polygon or MultiPolygon)
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics to paint on
        geom - the geometry
        fillColor - the fill color, if null, no filling
        borderColor - the border color, if null, no border
        projection - performs jts2Pixels to convert JTS coordinates to pixel coordinates

      • JTSPolygon2AWTArea

        public static java.awt.geom.Area JTSPolygon2AWTArea(Geometry geom,
                                                    GeomJTS2PixelProjection projection)
        Create a java.awt.Area object from a Polygon Geometry (Polygon or MultiPolygon).
        Parameters:
        geom - the geometry
        projection - performs jts2Pixels to convert JTS coordinates to pixel coordinates
        Returns:
        an area object
